relics.name: Burning Blood
relics.effect: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.
relics.flavor: Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.

relics.name: Cracked Core
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
relics.flavor: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire.It appears to be cracked.

relics.name: Pure Water
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.
relics.flavor: Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.

relics.name: Ring of the Snake
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
relics.flavor: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

relics.name: Akabeko
relics.effect: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.
relics.flavor: "Muuuu~"

relics.name: Pear
relics.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavor: A common fruit before the Spireblight.

relics.name: Anchor
relics.effect: Start each combat with 10 Block.
relics.flavor: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

relics.name: Ancient Tea Set
relics.effect: Whenever you rest, start your next combat with 2 extra Energy.
relics.flavor: The key to a refreshing night's rest.

relics.name: Art of War
relics.effect: If you don't play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.
relics.flavor: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.

relics.name: Bag of Marbles
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavor: A onece popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

relics.name: Bag of Preparation
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
relics.flavor: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

relics.name: Blood Vial
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavor: A vial containing the bolld of a pure and elder vampire.

relics.name: Bronze Scales
relics.effect: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.
relics.flavor: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.

relics.name: Centennial Puzzle
relics.effect: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
relics.flavor: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

relics.name: Ceramic Fish
relics.effect: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 gold.
relics.flavor: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

relics.name: Juzu Bracelet
relics.effect: Regular enemy combats are no longer randomized.
relics.flavor: A word against the unknown.

relics.name: Lantern
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.
relics.flavor: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

relics.name: Nunchaku
relics.effect: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.
relics.flavor: A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

relics.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavor: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

relics.name: Orichalcum
relics.effect: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavor: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

relics.name: Pen Nib
relics.effect: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
relics.flavor: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

relics.name: Potion Belt
relics.effect: Upon pickup, gain 2 potion slots.
relics.flavor: I can hold more Potions using this belt!

relics.name: Preserved Insect
relics.effect: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.
relics.flavor: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

relics.name: Regal Pillow
relics.effect: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.
relics.flavor: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

relics.name: Smiling Mask
relics.effect: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
relics.flavor: Mask worn by the Merchant. He must have spares...

relics.name: Tiny Chest
relics.effect: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.
relics.flavor: "A fine prototype." - The Architect

relics.name: Maw Bank
relics.effect: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works wehn you spend any Gold at a shop.
relics.flavor: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.

relics.name: Toy Ornithopter
relics.effect: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavor: "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"

relics.name: Vajra
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavor: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

relics.name: War Paint
relics.effect: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
relics.flavor: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

relics.name: Whetstone
relics.effect: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
relics.flavor: "Flesh never beats steel." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Bird-Faced Urn
relics.effect: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavor: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

relics.name: Ornamental Fan
relics.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavor: The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

relics.name: Mummified Hand
relics.effect: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.
relics.flavor: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

relics.name: Calipers
relics.effect: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
relics.flavor: "Mechanical precision leads to greatness" - The Architect

relics.name: Matryoshka
relics.effect: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open cantain 2 Relics.
relics.flavor: A stackable set of painted dolls. The paint depicts an unknown bird with white eyes and blue feathers.

relics.name: Champion Belt
relics.effect: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.
relics.flavor: Only the greatest may wear this belt.

relics.name: Dead Branch
relics.effect: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.
relics.flavor: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

relics.name: Ginger
relics.effect: You can no longer become Weakened.
relics.flavor: A potent tool in many tonics.

relics.name: Girya
relics.effect: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavor: This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.

relics.name: Ice Cream
relics.effect: Energy is now conserved between turns.
relics.flavor: "Delicious!"

relics.name: Incense Burner
relics.effect: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.
relics.flavor: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

relics.name: Lizard Tail
relics.effect: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (one time only).
relics.flavor: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

relics.name: Mango
relics.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.
relics.flavor: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spreblight.

relics.name: Old Coin
relics.effect: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold.
relics.flavor: Unique coins are highly valued by merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

relics.name: Peace Pipe
relics.effect: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
relics.flavor: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

relics.name: Pocketwatch
relics.effect: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavor: The hands seemstuck on the 3 o'clock position.

relics.name: Prayer Wheel
relics.effect: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.
relics.flavor: The wheel continues to spin, never stopping.

relics.name: Shovel
relics.effect: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.
relics.flavor: The Spire houses all number of relics from past civilizations and powerful adventurers lost to time. Timeto go dig thme up!

relics.name: Stone Calendar
relics.effect: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavor: The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

relics.name: Thread and Needle
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.
relics.flavor: Wrapping the magical thread around your body, you feel harder to the touch.

relics.name: Torii
relics.effect: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.
relics.flavor: Holding the small Torii, you feel a sense of calm and safety drift throuth your mind.

relics.name: Tungsten Rod
relics.effect: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.
relics.flavor: It's very very heavy.

relics.name: Turnip
relics.effect: You can no longer become Frail.
relics.flavor: Best with Ginger.

relics.name: Unceasing Top
relics.effect: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
relics.flavor: The top continues to spin effortlessly as if you were in a dream.

relics.name: Wing Boots
relics.effect: You may flight to any room up to 3 times.
relics.flavor: Stylish.

relics.name: Blue Candle
relics.effect: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse loses 1 HP and Exhausts the card.
relics.flavor: The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.

relics.name: Bottled Flame
relics.effect: Upon pickup, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
relics.flavor: Inside the bottole resides a flame that eternally burns.

relics.name: Bottled Lightning
relics.effect: Upon pickup, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
relics.flavor: Peering into the swirling maelstrom, you see a part of yourself staring back.

relics.name: Bottled Tornado
relics.effect: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
relics.flavor: The bottle gently hums and whirs.

relics.name: Black Blood
relics.effect: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
relics.flavor: The rage grows darker.

relics.name: Black Star
relics.effect: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.
relics.flavor: Originally discovered in the twon of the serpent, beside a solitary candle.

relics.name: Mark of Pain
relics.effect: Gain 1 energy at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.
relics.flavor: This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

relics.name: Runic Cube
relics.effect: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.
relics.flavor: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Champion Belt
relics.effect: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

relics.name: Charon's Ashes
relics.effect: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavor: Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

relics.name: Magic Flower
relics.effect: Healing is 50% more effective.
relics.flavor: A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.

relics.name: Self-Forming Clay
relics.effect: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn
relics.flavor: "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Red Skull
relics.effect: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength
relics.flavor: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

relics.name: Hovering Kite
relics.effect: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy
relics.flavor: The Kite floats around you in battle, propelled by a mysterious force.

relics.name: Ring of the Serpent
relics.effect: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card
relics.flavor: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.

relics.name: Ninja Scroll
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs to your hand
relics.flavor: Contains the secrets of assassination.

relics.name: Paper Crane
relics.effect: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%
relics.flavor: An origami of a creature from a past age.

relics.name: Tough Bandages
relics.effect: Whenever you discard a card, gain 3 Block
relics.flavor: Loss gives strength.

relics.name: Snecko Eye
relics.effect: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused
relics.flavor: An ey of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

relics.name: Nuclear Battery
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma
relics.flavor: Oooooh...

relics.name: Gold-Plated Cables
relics.effect: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time
relics.flavor: "Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo." - Ranwid

relics.name: Emotion Chip
relics.effect: If you lost HP last turn, trigger the passive ability of all your Orbs at the start of your turn

relics.name: Holy Water
relics.effect: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracle+ cards to your hand
relics.flavor: Collected from a time before the Spire.

relics.name: Violet Lotus
relics.effect: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional Energy
relics.flavor: The old texts describe that the surface of "mana pools" were littererd with these flowers.

relics.name: Cloak Clasp
relics.effect: At the start of your turn, retain up to 2 cards
relics.flavor: A simple but sturdy design.

relics.name: Damaru
relics.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra
relics.flavor: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing apath forward.

relics.name: Coffee Dripper
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites
relics.flavor: "Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work!" - The Architect

relics.name: Cursed Key
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse
relics.flavor: You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

relics.name: Ectoplasm
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold
relics.flavor: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

relics.name: Fusion Hammer
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites
relics.flavor: Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

relics.name: Philosopher's Stone
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength

relics.name: Runic Dome
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy intents
relics.flavor: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Sozu
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain potions
relics.flavor: You notice that magical liquids seem to loose their properties when near this relic.

relics.name: Velvet Choker
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn

relics.name: Pandora's Box
relics.effect: Transform all Strikes and Defends
relics.flavor: You have a bad feeling about opening this.

relics.name: Empty Cage
relics.effect: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck
relics.flavor: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid

relics.name: Astrolabe
relics.effect: Upon pickup, transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them
relics.flavor: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

relics.name: Calling Bell
relics.effect: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics
relics.flavor: This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

relics.name: Busted Crown
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Card rewards have 2 fewer cards to choose from
relics.flavor: The Champ's crown... or a pale imitation?

relics.name: Tiny House
relics.effect: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card
relics.flavor: "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect

relics.name: Strawberry
relics.effect: Raise your Max HP by 7
relics.flavor: "Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight." - Ranwid

relics.name: Singing Bowl
relics.effect: When adding cards to your deck, you may gain 2 Max HP instead
relics.flavor: This well-used artifact rings out with a beautiful melody when struck.

relics.name: Darkstone Periapt
relics.effect: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6
relics.flavor: The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

relics.name: Spirit Poop
relics.effect: It's unpleasant
relics.flavor: The charred remains of your offering to the spirits.

relics.name: Neow's Lament
relics.effect: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP
relics.flavor: The blessing of lamentation bestowed by Neow.

relics.name: Cultist Headpiece
relics.effect: You feel more talkative. CAW! CAAAW!
relics.flavor: Part of the Flock!

relics.name: Chemical X
relics.effect: When playing a cost X card, its effects are increased by 2
relics.flavor: WARNING: Do not combine with sugar, spice, and everything nice.

relics.name: Nilry's Codex
relics.effect: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.
relics.flavor: Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

relics.name: Clockwork Souvenir
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact
relics.flavor: "So many intricate gears."

relics.name: Dolly's Mirror
relics.effect: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck
relics.flavor: "I look funny in this."

relics.name: Frozen Eye
relics.effect: When viewing your draw pile, the cards are now shown in order
relics.flavor: Starting into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

relics.name: Hand Drill
relics.effect: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable
relics.flavor: Spirals are dangerous.

relics.name: Lee's Waffle
relics.effect: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP
relics.flavor: "Tastiest treat your will find in all the Spire! Baked today just for you."

relics.name: Medical Kit
relics.effect: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status exhausts it
relics.flavor: "Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!"

relics.name: Membership Card
relics.effect: 50% discount on all shop items
relics.flavor: "Bonus membership offer for my most valuable customers!"

relics.name: Orange Pellets
relics.effect: When you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs
relics.flavor: "Made from various fungi found throughout the Spire, they will stave off any affiction."

relics.name: Orrery
relics.effect: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.
relics.flavor: "Once you understarnd the univers..." - Zoroth

relics.name: Prismatic Shard
relics.effect: Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards and cards from other colors
relics.flavor: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new prespectives.

relics.name: Strange Spoon
relics.effect: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time
relics.flavor: Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.

relics.name: The Abacus
relics.effect: Gain 6 Block whenever you shuffle your draw pile
relics.flavor: "One...Two...Three..."

relics.name: Toolbox
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random colorless cards to add to your hand
relics.flavor: A tool for every job.

relics.name: Brimstone
relics.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength
relics.flavor: Emanates an infernal heat.

relics.name: Cauldron
relics.effect: When obtained, brews 5 random potions
relics.flavor: The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 4 get 1 free.

relics.name: Melange
relics.effect: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3
relics.flavor: Mysterious sands from an unknown origin. Smells of cinnamon.

relics.name: Dream Catcher
relics.effect: Whenever you Rest, you may add a rad into your deck
relics.flavor: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

relics.name: Teardrop Locket
relics.effect: Start each combat in Calm
relics.flavor: Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

relics.name: Duality
relics.effect: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 Dexterity
relics.flavor: "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

relics.name: Runic Pyramid
relics.effect: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand
relics.flavor: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Inserter
relics.effect: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot
relics.flavor: Push. Pull. Stack. Repeat.

relics.name: Symbiotic Virus
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark
relics.flavor: A litthle bit of bad can do a lot of good...

relics.name: Sundial
relics.effect: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain 2 Energy
relics.flavor: "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

relics.name: Enchiridion
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn
relics.flavor: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

relics.name: White Beast Statue
relics.effect: Enemies always drop potions when defeated
relics.flavor: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

relics.name: Mercury Hourglass
relics.effect: At the start of each turn, gain 2 Block for each buff you have
relics.flavor: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

relics.name: Golden Eye
relics.effect: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards
relics.flavor: See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

relics.name: Red Mask
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies
relics.flavor: this very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

relics.name: N'loth's Gift
relics.effect: The next non-boss chest you open contains 2 Relics
relics.flavor: The strange gift from N'loth. Whenever you try and unwrap it, another wrapped box of the same size lies within.

relics.name: N'loth's Hungry Face
relics.effect: The next non-boss chest you open is empty
relics.flavor: You feel hungry.

relics.name: Face Of Cleric
relics.effect: Raise your Max HP by 1 after each combat
relics.flavor: everyone loves Cleric.

relics.name: Ssserpent Head
relics.effect: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold
relics.flavor: The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything.

relics.name: Whetstone
relics.effect: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attack cards

relics.name: Shuriken
relics.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength
relics.flavor: Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

relics.name: Fossilized Helix
relics.effect: Prevent the first time you would lose HP in combat
relics.flavor: Seemingly indestructible, you wonder what kind of creature this belonged to.

relics.name: Runic Capacitor
relics.effect: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots
relics.flavor: More is better.

relics.name: Captain's Wheel
relics.effect: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.
relics.flavor: Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

relics.name: Tingsha
relics.effect: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy
relics.flavor: The sound this instrument generates seems to be capable of reverberating to painful levels of volume.

relics.name: The Specimen
relics.effect: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any poison it had to a random enemy
relics.flavor: "Fascinating! I found a mutated creature demonstrating astounding toxic properties. Storing a sample for later examination." - Ranwid

relics.name: Mutagenic Strength
relics.effect: Start each combat with 3 Strength that is lost at the end of your turn
relics.flavor: "The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger." - Unknown

relics.name: Du-Vu Doll
relics.effect: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength
relics.flavor: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

relics.name: Odd Mushroom
relics.effect: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage rather than 50%
relics.flavor: "After consuming trichella parastius I felt larger and less... susceptible." - Ranwid

relics.name: Necronomicon
relics.effect: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.
relics.flavor: Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book kdevouring your mind.

relics.name: Molten Egg
relics.effect: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is upgraded
relics.flavor: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

relics.name: Toxic Egg
relics.effect: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is upgraded
relics.flavor: "What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Frozen Egg
relics.effect: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is upgraded
relics.flavor: The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

relics.name: Question Card
relics.effect: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from
relics.flavor: "Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Sacred Bark
relics.effect: Double the effectiveness of all potions
relics.flavor: A bark rumored to originate from the World tree.

relics.name: Slaver's Collar
relics.effect: During Boss and Elite combats, gain an energy at the start of your turn.
relics.flavor: Rusty miserable chains.

relics.name: Eternal Feather
relics.effect: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 2 HP whenever you enter a rest site
relics.flavor: This feather appears to be completely indestructible. What bird does this possibly come from?

relics.name: Ink Bottle
relics.effect: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card
relics.flavor: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

relics.name: Happy Flower
relics.effect: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy
relics.flavor: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

relics.name: Mark of the Bloom
relics.effect: You can no longer heal
relics.flavor: In the Beyond, thoughts and reality are one.

relics.name: Warped Tongs
relics.effect: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat
relics.flavor: The cursed tongs emit a strong desire to return to where they were stolen from.

relics.name: The Boot
relics.effect: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5
relics.flavor: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

relics.name: Stone Calendar
relics.effect: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies

relics.name: Paper Frog
relics.effect: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%
relics.flavor: The paper continually folds and unfolds itself into the shape of a small creature.

relics.name: Horn Cleat
relics.effect: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block
relics.flavor: Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

relics.name: Art of War
relics.effect: If you don't play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn

relics.name: Bronze Scales
relics.effect: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back

relics.name: Gremlin Visage
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Weak
relics.flavor: Start each combat with 1 Weak.

relics.name: Gremlin Horn
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Weak
relics.flavor: "Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing untile the day they die. Remarkable." - Ranwid

relics.name: Cracked Core
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning

relics.name: Nuclear Battery
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma

relics.name: Gambling Chip
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards and draw that many cards
relics.flavor: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

relics.name: Golden Idol
relics.effect: Enemies drop 25% more Gold
relics.flavor: Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

relics.name: Ancient Tea Set
relics.effect: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy

relics.name: Twisted Funnel
relics.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies
relics.flavor: "I wouldn't drink out of it."

relics.name: Centennial Puzzle
relics.effect: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards

relics.name: Letter Opener
relics.effect: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies
relics.flavor: Unnaturally sharp.

relics.name: Pen Nib
relics.effect: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage

relics.name: Strike Dummy
relics.effect: Cards containing 'Strike' deal 3 additional damage
relics.flavor: It's beat up.

relics.name: Kunai
relics.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity
relics.flavor: A blade favored by assassins for its lethality at range.

relics.name: Frozen Core
relics.effect: If you end your turn with empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost
relics.flavor: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.

relics.name: Pantograph
relics.effect: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP
relics.flavor: "Solid foundations are not accidental. Tools for planning are a must." - The Architect

relics.name: Strange Spoon
relics.effect: Cards that would Exhaust have a 50% chance to instead return to your hand

relics.name: Sling of Courage
relics.effect: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength
relics.flavor: "A handy tool for dealing with particularly tough opponents."

relics.name: Ring of the Serpent
relics.effect: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card

relics.name: Frozen Eye
relics.effect: When viewing your draw pile, cards are shown in order

relics.name: Meat on the Bone
relics.effect: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP
relics.flavor: The meat keeps repenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

relics.name: Meal Ticket
relics.effect: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavor: "Complimentary meatballs with every visit!"

relics.name: Magic Flower
relics.effect: Healing is 50% more effective

relics.name: Data Disk
relics.effect: Start each combat with 1 Focus
relics.flavor: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

relics.name: Sozu
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain potions

relics.name: Incense Burner
relics.effect: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible

relics.name: Philosopher's Stone
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 2 Strength
relics.flavor: Raw energy emanates from the stone, empowering all nearby.

relics.name: Wrist Blade
relics.effect: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage
relics.flavor: Handy for assassinations.

relics.name: Cloak Clasp
relics.effect: At the start of each turn, retain up to 2 cards

relics.name: Snecko Skull
relics.effect: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison
relics.flavor: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and sommth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

relics.name: Prayer Wheel
relics.effect: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward

relics.name: Akabeko
relics.effect: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage

relics.name: The Courier
relics.effect: The merchant never runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%
relics.flavor: The Merchant's personal pet!

relics.name: Bloody Idol
relics.effect: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP
relics.flavor: The idol now weeps a constant stream of blood.

relics.name: Velvet Choker
relics.effect: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn
relics.flavor: "Immense power, but too limited." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Peace Pipe
relics.effect: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites

relics.name: Omamori
relics.effect: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain
relics.flavor: A common charm for staving off vile spirits.. This one seems to possessa spark of divine energy.
